SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REPORT R INNER JOIN REPORT_TYPE RT ON R.REPORT_TYPE_NO = RT.REPORT_TYPE_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER P ON R.TARGET_REPORT_MEMBER_NO = P.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER C ON R.REPORT_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON R.PROCESS_NO = C.SMALL_CATEGORY WHERE R.DEL_DT IS NULL AND C.LARGE_CATEGORY = 3
AND R.PROCESS_NO = #{pCateNo}
AND CATE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND ACCUSER '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND ACCUSED LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
AND REPORT_TYPE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT R.REPORT_NO,C.POST_NO, BT.BLTNBOARD_NM, PO.NM AS PNM, P.TITLE, P.REG_DT, P.CONTENTS AS POST, C.COMMENT_NO,M.NM AS CNM,M.IMG_FILE,C.CONTENTS AS CMT FROM COMMENTS C INNER JOIN REPORT R ON C.COMMENT_NO = R.COMMENT_NO INNER JOIN BULLETIN_BOARD P ON C.POST_NO = P.POST_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER PO ON P.MEMBER_NO = PO.MEMBER_NO INNER JOIN BOARD_TYPE BT ON P.BLTNBOARD_NO = BT.BLTNBOARD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO= C.MEMBER_NO WHERE R.REPORT_NO = #{rptNoC}

SELECT R.REPORT_NO,P.POST_NO, BT.BLTNBOARD_NM, P.TITLE, P.REG_DT, P.CONTENTS AS POST, M.NM AS PNM FROM BULLETIN_BOARD P INNER JOIN REPORT R ON P.POST_NO = R.POST_NO INNER JOIN BOARD_TYPE BT ON P.BLTNBOARD_NO = BT.BLTNBOARD_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO= P.MEMBER_NO WHERE R.REPORT_NO = #{rptNoP}
